name: QR-Connects
description: Create a QR-Connect and invite your friends! Set up a potluck, afterparty, or share a poll. Features MERN stack (MongoDB Express React NodeJs).

name: Grocery List Manager
description: This application allows you to add grocery stores and items. Automatically calculates unit pricing. See which items are the cheapest, or where to find them.

name: Emoji Translator & Keyboard
description: Decodes user input while changing any emojis into their description values. Also features an emoji keyboard, clickable emojis, and an information area detailing each emoji.
